original_text: It will be very bad for you people who are always deceiving others. You cannot leave your sins behind, like someone who pulls a cart with a rope.
korean_text: 거짓으로 끈을 삼아 죄악을 끌며 수레 줄로 함 같이 죄악을 끄는 자는 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you people
You cannot leave your sins behind
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 죄를 뒤에 둘 수 없다

sentences.original_text: like someone who pulls a cart with a rope
